aircraft.value: Eagle Vision-9 - AC-4002-212 at Sector West Station

defect_observed.value: Navigation system GPS signal loss. Abnormality observed during system test.

root_cause.value: Improper calibration during last maintenance cycle

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Communication Suite component. Inspection revealed damage to critical components.

corrective_action.value: Adjust calibration settings to manufacturer specifications

preventive_action.value: Reduce inspection interval for affected component type

remarks_investigation.value: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.

remarks_design.value: Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate. Date: 22/10/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. A.K. Sharma

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality aspects reviewed. Manufacturing process controls are adequate. Recommend supplier quality audit. Date: 25/10/2023 Signature: Dr. A.K. Sharma

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Fleet experience reviewed. Similar occurrences noted on other platforms. Support fleet-wide inspection. Date: 26/10/2023 Signature: Dr. A.K. Sharma

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality oversight review completed. Recommend monitoring effectiveness of implemented preventive actions. Date: 28/10/2023 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) From regulatory standpoint, investigation meets required standards. Approve proposed corrective actions. Date: 29/10/2023 Signature: Dr. P.L. Mehta
